core.dbmanager.associations

Interface UserManager

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DoctorManager, PatientManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoctorManagerImpl, PatientManagerImpl, UserManagerImpl

    public interface UserManager

    • Method Detail

      • createNewUser

        boolean createNewUser(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String surname,
                      java.lang.String cf)
        Creates a new user with all related information. It returns true if the operation is successful, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        id - - user's univocal ID
        name - - user's name
        surname - - user's surname
        cf - - user's CF
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise

      • getUserData

        org.json.JSONObject getUserData(java.lang.String id)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the data related to the specific user.
        Parameters:
        id - - user's univocal ID
        Returns:
        a JSON object describing the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(java.lang.String id)
        Deletes a specific user. It returns true if the operation is successful, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        id - - user's univocal ID
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise.

      • getUserAssociations

                                       java.lang.String role,
                                       javax.ws.rs.client.WebTarget target)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns all the associations related to the specific user.

        userId - - user's univocal ID
        Returns:
